drinks.name: Manhattan
drinks.ingredients: 2 ounces rye whiskey, 1 ounce sweet vermouth, 2 dashes Angostura bitters, Garnish: brandied cherry (or lemon twist if preferred)
drinks.history: originated at the Manhattan Club in New York City in the mid-1870s

drinks.name: Shirley Temple
drinks.ingredients: 1 ounce grenadine, small ice cubes, 4 ounces lemon-lime soda (such as 7UP or Sprite), chilled, 4 ounces ginger ale, chilled, maraschino cherries for garnish
drinks.history: The cocktail may have been invented in the 1930s by a bartender at Chasen's, a restaurant in Beverly Hills, California, to serve then child actress Shirley Temple (1928–2014). However, other claims to its origin have been made.

drinks.name: Ocean Water
drinks.ingredients: 3 ounces blue fruit punch, 2 ounces 7UP, 2 teaspoons sweetened lime juice, 1 tablespoon pineapple juice, red gummy fish for garnish, lime wedges
drinks.history: Ocean Water quickly became the drive-in chain's signature summertime drink with its vibrant blue color and tropical flavor. Over the years, cocktail enthusiasts incorporated ingredients like blue curacao and coconut rum to create a refreshing drink for adults.

drinks.name: Pineapple Sunrise
drinks.ingredients: 4 ounces pineapple juice, 2 ounces 7UP, 1 tablespoon grenadine, maraschino cherries for garnish
drinks.history: The original tequila sunrise contained tequila, crème de cassis, lime juice, and soda water, and was served at the Arizona Biltmore Hotel where it was created by Gene Sulit in the 1930s or 1940s.

drinks.name: Watermelon Limeade
drinks.ingredients: 4 cups cubed and peeled seedless watermelon, 1/2 cup fresh lime juice, 1 teaspoon simple syrup, lime wheels for garnish

drinks.name: Sweet Tea
drinks.ingredients: 12 individual tea bags, 1 cup granulated sugar, Ice, Fresh mint leaves or lemon slices (optional)

drinks.name: Margarita
drinks.ingredients: 1 ½ oz tequila, 1 oz Triple Sec or Cointreau, ¾ oz lime juice

drinks.name: Moscow Mule
drinks.ingredients: 2 oz vodka, 4 oz ginger beer, ½ oz lime juice

drinks.name: Oreo Milkshake
drinks.ingredients: 6 chocolate sandwich cookies (such as Oreo®), 3 scoops vanilla ice cream, ¾ cup milk

drinks.name: Mocha Latte
drinks.ingredients: 3 ounces espresso, or ½ cup strong coffee, 6 ounces whole milk, or milk of choice, 2 Tablespoons chocolate syrup

drinks.name: Masala Chai
drinks.ingredients: 1 whole cinnamon stick, 6-8 green cardamom pods, 1 tsp whole black peppercorns, 3-4 whole cloves, 2 ½ cups water, 2 Tbsp grated ginger, 3 Tbsp loose leaf black tea

drinks.name: Cosmopolitan Cocktail
drinks.ingredients: 1 ounce vodka or citron vodka, 1 ounce 100% cranberry juice (unsweetened), ½ ounce Cointreau, ½ ounce fresh lime juice, 1 teaspoon simple syrup, garnish: lime wheel

drinks.name: Gimlet
drinks.ingredients: 2 ounces gin, ½ ounce lime juice, ½ ounce simple syrup or pure maple syrup, Splash of soda water (optional)

drinks.name: Berry Delicious Smoothie
drinks.ingredients: 2 cups frozen mixed berries, 1 cup strawberry flavored yogurt, 1 banana, sliced, 1 cup milk, ½ teaspoon white sugar (Optional)

drinks.name: Butterbeer
drinks.ingredients: 1/2 cup heavy cream (for the top), 1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon or pumpkin pie spice, 1 pinch salt, 2 tablespoons butterscotch topping, 1 to 2 teaspoons lemon juice, 6 (12 ounce) bottles cream soda
